attributes.action: Re-name "New Labour" as "The New Fascist Party"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Labour Party's desire for us all to have ID cards is thoroughly illiberal. ID cards are a step on the road to a police state and totalitarian government. The next step will be the abolition of elections. "1984" was a warning, not a template.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
